text:
Might be some of those floating around - However - Most HubSpot CMS Devs are happily employed (they are in high demand). 

If you can find a good Shopify or Wordpress freelance developer who’s open to learning - We could onboard them to HubSpot. But this would just take some time/energy to get them going... anytime you learn a new system it’s a learning curve. 

I say Shopify dev specifically because HubSpot is quite similar... so if they know Shopify, it can be easy to hit the ground running on HubSpot
